synopsis.text:
And so begins the thrilling adventure of Shiina Tamai, a spirited young girl who stumbles upon an enigmatic star-shaped creature during her summer vacation at her grandparents' remote island home. Naming the creature Hoshimaru, Shiina forms an instant bond with it, only to discover that her new friend is far from ordinary. As she returns home and encounters other children with similar creatures, Shiina is unwittingly thrust into a perilous world where these beings hold immense power.

With her newfound companions, Shiina navigates through a whirlwind of extraterrestrial threats and uncovers a clandestine group of psychic children. As she grapples with her destiny and the true nature of her celestial companion, Shiina must determine if Hoshimaru is a loyal ally or a potential menace to mankind. Joined by her friend Akira, the duo faces the daunting task of safeguarding the world from those who seek to harness the dragonets for nefarious purposes, turning an innocent summer escapade into a high-stakes battle for the fate of humanity.
